mapper.select: SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY createdAt DESC
SELECT * FROM events WHERE status = 'ONGOING' ORDER BY startDate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM event_participants WHERE eventId = #{eventId} AND memberId = #{memberId} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT ec.*, m.email FROM event_comments ec JOIN members m ON ec.memberId = m.id WHERE ec.eventId = #{eventId} ORDER BY ec.createdAt DESC
SELECT ec.*, m.email FROM event_comments ec JOIN members m ON ec.memberId = m.id WHERE ec.eventId = #{eventId} AND ec.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY ec.createdAt DESC
SELECT wp.id as winnerPostId, e.eventCategory, e.title, e.startDate, e.endDate FROM winner_posts wp JOIN events e ON wp.eventId = e.id WHERE wp.isPublished = true ORDER BY wp.createdAt DESC
SELECT e.eventCategory, wp.title, wp.content FROM winner_posts wp JOIN events e ON wp.eventId = e.id WHERE wp.id = #{winnerPostId} AND wp.isPublished = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_comments (eventId, memberId, comment) VALUES (#{eventId}, #{memberId}, #{comment})
mapper.update: UPDATE event_participants SET status = #{status}, cancelledAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE eventId = (SELECT eventId FROM event_comments WHERE id = #{commentId}) AND memberId = (SELECT memberId FROM event_comments WHERE id = #{commentId})
